title: Patreon Picks #1
description:
Chris Garcia, Karen Maruyama, Kevin Bohl, Joe Matarese, Oz du Soleil and TS Madison share stories about a big fight, a closed bar, a jealous husband, canceled plans and a well endowed Turk.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Make a one-time donation to RISK! at PayPal.me/RISKshow

Get tickets to RISK! live shows at RISK-show.com/tour

Get the RISK! book at TheRISKBook.com

Take our storytelling classes at TheStoryStudio.org

Hire Kevin Allison to make a personalized video at Cameo.com/TheKevinAllison

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Natalie MacMaster, Joe Matarese, Oz du Soleil, Lindsey Buckingham, Karen Maruyama, TS Madison, Kevin Bohl, Jeff Barr, Donna Summer, Kevin Allison)
